## UPLCEncoder class

UPLCEncoder class for encoding Untyped Plutus Core (UPLC) programs. Extends the FlatEncoder class to provide UPLC-specific encoding functionality.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class UPLCEncoder extends FlatEncoder 
```
**Extends:** FlatEncoder
